31 Dec 2015: realize HST is not astromtric corrected, everything needs to be shifted by (0.5963", 0.8372")

26 Dec 2015:
# Object RA Dec, offset based on Claeskens+06 Table 2
G 11:31:51.40200, -12:31:59.23 <=> 172.964175, -12.53311944
